name: Curupira Legends - Return of the Guardian
name_original: Curupira Legends - Return of the Guardian
description:
This project was developed for the 2020 Game Jam+ of Minas Gerais under ~48 hours.

Chosen Theme: Brazilian Mythology, Nature Protectors

Diversifiers: "Cuide de Você!", "Blips & Blops"

Categoria: #PC

Team:

  • CazadorImperial - Game Designer, Programmer
  • Guizera - Game Designer
  • Flávio - 2D Artist

Engine: Unity 2020.1.7f

Assets:

  • Eric Matyas - Insane Gameplay
  • Eric Matyas - Battle of the Ancients
  • https://soundimage.org/
